jcr:title: Teaser with Cards
jcr:description: Text and Asset component. Allows you to set text with descriptive image. Ordering can be left or right.

cardStyle.name: ./cardStyle
cardStyle.fieldLabel: Card style for winter experience cards

buyCta.name: ./buy
buyCta.fieldDescription: Buy Button Text (Used in card style experience and dining)

viewAllCta.name: ./viewAllText
viewAllCta.fieldDescription: View All Button Text (Used in card style experience and dining)

viewAllLink.emptyText: Link that will be opened when this is clicked
viewAllLink.name: ./viewAllLink
viewAllLink.fieldDescription: Link that will be opened when this is clicked

limit.name: ./limit
limit.fieldDescription: Enter card limit for road trip cards.

dayText.name: ./durationUnit
dayText.fieldDescription: Days Text (Used in card style road trip)

byText.name: ./byText
byText.fieldDescription: By Text (Used in card style experience)

diningCards.fieldDescription: Click 'Add' to add a new Text Card

title.name: ./subCategory
title.fieldLabel: Sub Category (Mandatory to fill for Dining Cards)

header.name: ./header/heading/text
header.fieldLabel: Component Header (Mandatory to fill in General Cards, Text Cards and Full Image Cards)

headerLinkUrl.emptyText: Header Link that will be opened when this is clicked
headerLinkUrl.name: ./header/link/url
headerLinkUrl.fieldDescription: Header Link that will be opened when this is clicked

hideDescription.name: ./hideDescription
hideDescription.fieldDescription: Check this if Description field must be hidden in all cards

grey.text: Grey for Single and Multiple cards

backgroundOrnamentId.name: ./backgroundOrnamentId
backgroundOrnamentId.fieldLabel: Background Ornament ID for General and Article(Theme) Cards

cards.fieldDescription: Click 'Add' to add a new Text Card

type.name: ./type
type.fieldDescription: Choose card type, by default it's manual where you can fill all the data in this dialog. Another option is for choosing another object to be displayed in this card

activityReference.name: ./activityReference
activityReference.fieldDescription: Activity page reference. Select path to the activity.

use-activity-link.name: ./useActivityLink
use-activity-link.fieldDescription: Check this to use link from the content page reference of the specified activity. If the activity link is empty it won't be displayed.

description.name: ./description
description.fieldLabel: Description (For the variant with button (download) the Char max must be 246.)

tagLines.fieldDescription: Tag Line will work as feature tag line if Featured tag copy is authored, else simple tag line

field.name: ./simpleTagLines
field.fieldDescription: Tag Line will work as feature tag line if Featured tag copy is authored, else simple tag line

title.name: ./title
title.fieldLabel: Title (Mandatory to fill in General Cards, Text Cards and Article Cards)

granite:data.showhide-target-value: a-general-cards b-text-cards f-article-cards full-img-winter-cards manual e-full-image-cards book-your-trip where-to-stay where-to-eat top-attractions

linkCopy.fieldLabel: Link Copy (Mandatory to fill in General Cards and Full Image cards)

targetInNewWindow.fieldDescription: Opens the link in a new window
